level.heading: REGULATION OF HOLDERS OF CERTIFICATES OR REGISTRATIONS (ยง 17-4009)

level.text: A board may take the same disciplinary actions against the holder of a certificate or registration as it may take against the holder of a license under ยง514 of the Act, D.C. Code ยง2-3305.14 (1987 Supp.) for the grounds stated in that section.
The Director may take any action with respect to the holder of a registration that a board is authorized to take under the Act or this subtitle against the holder of a license or certificate.
